ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer

cookingTips: Do not drain the pineapple—include all juice for moisture and pineapple flavor in the bread
Use beer at room temperature to avoid shocking the batter with cold liquid
Stir the batter gently by hand—do not overmix, as this can develop gluten and make the bread tough
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you balance the sweetness of pineapple and the tang of beer to create an interesting flavor profile?
